rules.description: Accept IPsec Authentication Header, Encap Security Payload (AH, ESP)
Accept HTTP 8485 threat prevention on LANs (TCP/8485)
Accept HTTPS 8486 threat prevention on LANs (TCP/8486)
Drop packets not related to any session
Example: A rule of rejecting TCP sessions to 1.2.3.4 port 1234
Example: A rule of rejecting TCP port 21 (FTP) from 192.168.1.100
Send all traffic to wan policy 1
